controllers.discussion

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.AbstractCRUDController<Comment,java.lang.Long>
          • controllers.discussion.CommentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    @Singleton
public class CommentController
extends AbstractCRUDController<Comment,java.lang.Long>
    Concrete implementation of an AbstractCRUDController to retrieve and manipulate Comment Objects via RESTful HTTP Request.
    Author:
    cbi

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @SessionAuth
public play.mvc.Result create()
        Description copied from class: AbstractCRUDController
        Creates a model object via the GenericDAO, given by the serialized Object of the delivered JSON Node from the HTTP request. Method is annotated with SessionAuth action, which intercepts the request, to verify the callers session and permissions.
        Overrides:
        create in class AbstractCRUDController<Comment,java.lang.Long>

        HTTP result
